item.title: Chip Wars
item.description:
The global semiconductor landscape has witnessed a gradual, yet dramatic evolution over the last two decades. It took several years for old contours to give way to the new; and the transformation that began toward the end of the PC wave of computing accelerated well into the mobile computing era…

item.title: State of the State of the Union
item.description:
When I was a kid, I remember watching the State of the Union address every year. My father was a sixth-grade teacher, and also extremely interested in politics, so it was definitely going to be on, and by the mid-80’s I was paying enough attention to politics on my own that I would also tune in. I remember laughing about Tip O’Neill appearing to just op…

URL: https://chadorzel.substack.com/p/state-of-the-state-of-the-union?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: The Thin Gruel of Monetary-Policy Discussion These Days
